blog.name: ticklikeabomb
blog.title: lettres de fonsèques
blog.description:
Dropping my imagination here 🖌 NSFW 18+ ONLY/ Writing for the Plus Size Queens 👑

MASTERLIST

body:
Rule nr 1 - Part 7

Pairing : Avengers x Plus Size Reader

Warnings : Language ; spelling/grammar mistakes ; angst ; mention of killing

Word Count : 1.7k

A/N :  Italic = Flashbacks    Meaning of the name Ylva ->  http://www.first-names-meanings.com/names/name-YLVA.html

You heard knocks on your door and headed towards it, knowing very well who it was. You opened the door revealing him. He looked at you and you stepped aside, letting him in. He sat down on the couch and waited patiently. Your nerves were starting to boil and you asked with a fake smile « What can I do for you Nicholas? » He looked around him, played with his fingertips, took his sunglasses out and answered « It’s time for them to know Y/N. »

You meditated his words before replying « To know what, old friend? » He sighed and cleared his throat « Y/N, I will never be able to repay for what you did for my family and I. You saved my grandfather and you saved me more times than I can count. Without your intervention, I wouldn’t have lost only an eye but I would have lost my life. You’ve been protecting the Fury’s for decades now, but at the recent events in Louisiana, the board is asking too many questions. The Avengers are asking too many questions. I’m sorry but I’m afraid I don’t have the power to keep you as a secret anymore. » You nodded calmly at his little speech, stood up, grabbed a glass of water and sat down again.

« You know that once my secret’s out there, I will be tracked down, don’t you? Not only by the enemies but also by the government. And you also know how I feel about governments.», you mumbled with a deep voice and piercing gaze. « I can assure you that you will not be tracked down », he replied. « How can you be so sure? », you continued calmly. He took a quick breath and exclaimed « Because you’ll be surrounded by the team who will have your back. » The glass in your hand shattered after those words left his mouth. You laughed dryly and said « The team? Have my back? Oh Nick, this isn’t a ‘make a wish’ kind of situation. I will not return, I don’t trust them. I shouldn’t have trusted them in the first place. The only people I still can count on is Thor, Loki, Shuri and Hulk. »

There was a moment of silence before he spoke again « They have the right to know that you’ve been around all the time, influencing their lives, saving them when necessary. Steve Rogers has the right to know ! » « Are you done? », you responded annoyed. He stood up and prepared to leave. « Ylva forgive them. We all make mistakes. They need you and as much as you want to deny, you need them too. You may don’t trust them anymore but I do and that should indicate you how serious I am. » You stood there looking at him firm, no emotion coming across your face or body. « Anyway, I’ll see you tomorrow », he finished. You nodded your head and opened the door.

Flashback (A year ago)

You entered the living room where Wanda and Vision were watching TV and Loki was occupying his mind with a book. You said hello and when you were about to enter the kitchen you heard a voice calling ‘Ylva’. Not paying attention and losing your guard, you turned around and said « Yes ». Wanda and Vision looked at you confused and Wanda asked « Yes what Y/N? ». You swallowed harshly and lied « Emh yes do you need anything from the kitchen? ». They shook their head ‘no’ and Loki just looked at you with a piercing gaze. You quickly entered the kitchen and grabbed a beer that you chuffed in seconds. Heat slightly creeping up your face and your nails digging in your flesh, angry for almost exposing yourself. After calming down, you joined them in the living room and noticed the source of the voice. They were watching a documentary about the Viking period and they were explaining the meanings of some names :

‘ The name Ylva is originally Scandinavian, meaning she-wolf. The girls given that name are bright, alert and playful. Considerably eloquent and expressive, they love to communicate and exchange ideas. They are witty and take great pleasure in entertaining those around them. Excellent actresses, they are capable of doing fantastic imitations of others, and are adaptable with a critical mind and a keen sense of observation. Always on the lookout for new horizons, they have the taste for traveling.Very involved in their family environment, they seek to please their parents and need constant reminders that they are loved. It is desirable that they have siblings, and they should participate in group activities to help develop their sense of solidarity.They have a profound sense of justice and it is probably not a good idea to cross them or to wrong the people who they care about.’, exclaimed the documentarist.

« Y/N are you alright? You don’t look very good», asked Wanda worried. You blinked your eyes a few times and cleared your throat before replying « I’m fine, just a little tired. I’m gonna lie down for a few hours. » You stood up and headed towards your bed. When you opened the door, Loki was standing against the wall. « Loki? What are you doing in my room? How did you do that? », you asked faking shock. He just smirked mischievously and said « Lady Y/N don’t hurt my feelings in treating me like a fool. Your people had more respect for me than that. » « I don’t know what you’re talking about? » He just laughed loudly.

« Still denying it, hmm?, his melodic voice stated. He stepped closer and you stood your ground. You narrowed your eyes and saw that you were discovered. Grabbing discretely a knife hidden on your back, you said « How do you know? » His smirk grew and his eyes lit up « I’m the God of Mischief after all. » He took your hand that carried the knife, took it away and placed a chaste kiss on your hand. « It’s an honor to meet a pure Viking. I always loved your people the most. » You chuckled and replied « Only because we were the ones worshipping you. » He smiled again and continued « Seeing your reaction earlier, I presume your birth name is Ylva. » You gave him a quick nod. « As the God that I am, I also know something else. » You narrowed your eyes again suspiciously. He stepped closer and began to whisper « I know that you are … », but was cut off by someone knocking harshly on the door. You quickly walked to the door and discovered Thor.

« Lady Y/N sorry to disturb but I was wondering if … Oh here he is. Loki what are you doing here? », he exclaimed happily. You fake smiled and replied « Loki was telling me about the story of the book he was reading. » « Is that so? », asked Thor. You looked at both of them and said « Yes it’s about a man who discovered his friend’s secret and he decided to reveal it to everyone. When his friend discovered it, he took revenge and killed him slowly and very painfully. » Loki smiled and intervened « Yes Brother indeed. But it’s a Midgardian book, so it doesn’t surprise me. A God like us would never reveal someone’s secret like that, right brother? » Thor laughed loudly and exclaimed « You’re perfectly right Loki, we would never do that. » You raised an eyebrow at Loki and he nodded. « Good to know », you replied. Thor dragged his brother out of the room and before disappearing in the elevator, Loki turned around and winked at you.

Present Day

« Tony everything is ready. The first guests are arriving », whispered Pepper in her husband’s ear while she was embracing him. The billionaire sighed and dropped his head in the crock of his wife’s neck. « I shouldn’t have throw it. I’m not in the mood to party. » She caressed his hair and said sweetly « I know baby but what is done is done. We have to welcome our guests. » He nodded and took her hand in his and they headed down.

The moment Steve and Bucky joined the Party, they were ambushed by old veterans and U.S.Army soldiers. Natasha and Wanda were at the bar washing their guilt with vodka. Clint was in deep conversation with Scott, Sam and Rhodey, when Fury stepped in. « Hello Gentleman, are you enjoying yourselves? »  « Mnehh », mumbled Clint. Tony joined them « If it isn’t our favorite one-eyed person? », he exclaimed. Nick chuckled and told him that flattering him was never the way to get on his good side. Once Steve and Bucky managed to get out of the conversations, they headed towards Natasha, Wanda and Peter, who joined them during the night. Slowly the rest of the team gathered around, a drink in their hand and tried to have fun. T’Challa and Okoye finally arrived. « Hello my friends, isn’t it a lovely night », exclaimed the Kind happily. They all greeted him and Tony asked « I don’t see your sister around. I hope she’s not sick ? » Okoye gave a look at her King, look that caught the attention of Natasha. « I’m sorry Stark, Shuri couldn’t make it. She had other plans. » « Oh alright, no problem. I was looking forward to talk science with her but I understand», replied Tony a little sad. « Again I apologize. It seems that Y/N was faster at dropping the invitation », responded T’Challa.

« She’s at Y/N’s party? », asked Bucky to which the King nodded. « Yeah and she’s having a lot of fun », exclaimed suddenly Peter and showed them Shuri’s Instagram story. Tony took a look at the team and a look around him - all those bureaucrats and diplomats were turning his stomach. He headed to the stage and took the mic, cancelling the live band that was playing. He cleared his throat and exclaimed « Excuse me everyone…do I have your attention? Yes, good. I’m sorry but the party is over. There has been an impediment. Please finish up your drink and head home. » There were people shocked that he would just throw them out like that but Tony being Tony couldn’t care less. He joined the team again and smiled brightly « Avengers we have a Party to attend. Does anyone knows where it is? » The team smiled and T’Challa responded confused « Yes I have the address. » « Awesome let’s go ! », cheered Tony.

At a corner of the room, Nick Fury smiled smugly and texted Maya ‘They’re on their way.’

*gifs not mine, credit to owner*

He joined the team again and smiled brightly « Avengers we have a Party to attend. Does anyone knows where it is? » The team smiled and T’Challa responded confused « Yes I have the address. » « Awesome let’s go ! », cheered Tony.

At a corner of the room, Nick Fury smiled smugly and texted Maya ‘They’re on their way.’

trail.content:
Rule nr 1 - Part 7

Pairing : Avengers x Plus Size Reader

Warnings : Language ; spelling/grammar mistakes ; angst ; mention of killing

Word Count : 1.7k

A/N :  Italic = Flashbacks    Meaning of the name Ylva ->  http://www.first-names-meanings.com/names/name-YLVA.html

You heard knocks on your door and headed towards it, knowing very well who it was. You opened the door revealing him. He looked at you and you stepped aside, letting him in. He sat down on the couch and waited patiently. Your nerves were starting to boil and you asked with a fake smile « What can I do for you Nicholas? » He looked around him, played with his fingertips, took his sunglasses out and answered « It’s time for them to know Y/N. »

You meditated his words before replying « To know what, old friend? » He sighed and cleared his throat « Y/N, I will never be able to repay for what you did for my family and I. You saved my grandfather and you saved me more times than I can count. Without your intervention, I wouldn’t have lost only an eye but I would have lost my life. You’ve been protecting the Fury’s for decades now, but at the recent events in Louisiana, the board is asking too many questions. The Avengers are asking too many questions. I’m sorry but I’m afraid I don’t have the power to keep you as a secret anymore. » You nodded calmly at his little speech, stood up, grabbed a glass of water and sat down again.

« You know that once my secret’s out there, I will be tracked down, don’t you? Not only by the enemies but also by the government. And you also know how I feel about governments.», you mumbled with a deep voice and piercing gaze. « I can assure you that you will not be tracked down », he replied. « How can you be so sure? », you continued calmly. He took a quick breath and exclaimed « Because you’ll be surrounded by the team who will have your back. » The glass in your hand shattered after those words left his mouth. You laughed dryly and said « The team? Have my back? Oh Nick, this isn’t a ‘make a wish’ kind of situation. I will not return, I don’t trust them. I shouldn’t have trusted them in the first place. The only people I still can count on is Thor, Loki, Shuri and Hulk. »

There was a moment of silence before he spoke again « They have the right to know that you’ve been around all the time, influencing their lives, saving them when necessary. Steve Rogers has the right to know ! » « Are you done? », you responded annoyed. He stood up and prepared to leave. « Ylva forgive them. We all make mistakes. They need you and as much as you want to deny, you need them too. You may don’t trust them anymore but I do and that should indicate you how serious I am. » You stood there looking at him firm, no emotion coming across your face or body. « Anyway, I’ll see you tomorrow », he finished. You nodded your head and opened the door.

Flashback (A year ago)

You entered the living room where Wanda and Vision were watching TV and Loki was occupying his mind with a book. You said hello and when you were about to enter the kitchen you heard a voice calling ‘Ylva’. Not paying attention and losing your guard, you turned around and said « Yes ». Wanda and Vision looked at you confused and Wanda asked « Yes what Y/N? ». You swallowed harshly and lied « Emh yes do you need anything from the kitchen? ». They shook their head ‘no’ and Loki just looked at you with a piercing gaze. You quickly entered the kitchen and grabbed a beer that you chuffed in seconds. Heat slightly creeping up your face and your nails digging in your flesh, angry for almost exposing yourself. After calming down, you joined them in the living room and noticed the source of the voice. They were watching a documentary about the Viking period and they were explaining the meanings of some names :

‘ The name Ylva is originally Scandinavian, meaning she-wolf. The girls given that name are bright, alert and playful. Considerably eloquent and expressive, they love to communicate and exchange ideas. They are witty and take great pleasure in entertaining those around them. Excellent actresses, they are capable of doing fantastic imitations of others, and are adaptable with a critical mind and a keen sense of observation. Always on the lookout for new horizons, they have the taste for traveling.Very involved in their family environment, they seek to please their parents and need constant reminders that they are loved. It is desirable that they have siblings, and they should participate in group activities to help develop their sense of solidarity.They have a profound sense of justice and it is probably not a good idea to cross them or to wrong the people who they care about.’, exclaimed the documentarist.

« Y/N are you alright? You don’t look very good», asked Wanda worried. You blinked your eyes a few times and cleared your throat before replying « I’m fine, just a little tired. I’m gonna lie down for a few hours. » You stood up and headed towards your bed. When you opened the door, Loki was standing against the wall. « Loki? What are you doing in my room? How did you do that? », you asked faking shock. He just smirked mischievously and said « Lady Y/N don’t hurt my feelings in treating me like a fool. Your people had more respect for me than that. » « I don’t know what you’re talking about? » He just laughed loudly.

« Still denying it, hmm?, his melodic voice stated. He stepped closer and you stood your ground. You narrowed your eyes and saw that you were discovered. Grabbing discretely a knife hidden on your back, you said « How do you know? » His smirk grew and his eyes lit up « I’m the God of Mischief after all. » He took your hand that carried the knife, took it away and placed a chaste kiss on your hand. « It’s an honor to meet a pure Viking. I always loved your people the most. » You chuckled and replied « Only because we were the ones worshipping you. » He smiled again and continued « Seeing your reaction earlier, I presume your birth name is Ylva. » You gave him a quick nod. « As the God that I am, I also know something else. » You narrowed your eyes again suspiciously. He stepped closer and began to whisper « I know that you are … », but was cut off by someone knocking harshly on the door. You quickly walked to the door and discovered Thor.

« Lady Y/N sorry to disturb but I was wondering if … Oh here he is. Loki what are you doing here? », he exclaimed happily. You fake smiled and replied « Loki was telling me about the story of the book he was reading. » « Is that so? », asked Thor. You looked at both of them and said « Yes it’s about a man who discovered his friend’s secret and he decided to reveal it to everyone. When his friend discovered it, he took revenge and killed him slowly and very painfully. » Loki smiled and intervened « Yes Brother indeed. But it’s a Midgardian book, so it doesn’t surprise me. A God like us would never reveal someone’s secret like that, right brother? » Thor laughed loudly and exclaimed « You’re perfectly right Loki, we would never do that. » You raised an eyebrow at Loki and he nodded. « Good to know », you replied. Thor dragged his brother out of the room and before disappearing in the elevator, Loki turned around and winked at you.

Present Day

« Tony everything is ready. The first guests are arriving », whispered Pepper in her husband’s ear while she was embracing him. The billionaire sighed and dropped his head in the crock of his wife’s neck. « I shouldn’t have throw it. I’m not in the mood to party. » She caressed his hair and said sweetly « I know baby but what is done is done. We have to welcome our guests. » He nodded and took her hand in his and they headed down.

The moment Steve and Bucky joined the Party, they were ambushed by old veterans and U.S.Army soldiers. Natasha and Wanda were at the bar washing their guilt with vodka. Clint was in deep conversation with Scott, Sam and Rhodey, when Fury stepped in. « Hello Gentleman, are you enjoying yourselves? »  « Mnehh », mumbled Clint. Tony joined them « If it isn’t our favorite one-eyed person? », he exclaimed. Nick chuckled and told him that flattering him was never the way to get on his good side. Once Steve and Bucky managed to get out of the conversations, they headed towards Natasha, Wanda and Peter, who joined them during the night. Slowly the rest of the team gathered around, a drink in their hand and tried to have fun. T’Challa and Okoye finally arrived. « Hello my friends, isn’t it a lovely night », exclaimed the Kind happily. They all greeted him and Tony asked « I don’t see your sister around. I hope she’s not sick ? » Okoye gave a look at her King, look that caught the attention of Natasha. « I’m sorry Stark, Shuri couldn’t make it. She had other plans. » « Oh alright, no problem. I was looking forward to talk science with her but I understand», replied Tony a little sad. « Again I apologize. It seems that Y/N was faster at dropping the invitation », responded T’Challa.

« She’s at Y/N’s party? », asked Bucky to which the King nodded. « Yeah and she’s having a lot of fun », exclaimed suddenly Peter and showed them Shuri’s Instagram story. Tony took a look at the team and a look around him - all those bureaucrats and diplomats were turning his stomach. He headed to the stage and took the mic, cancelling the live band that was playing. He cleared his throat and exclaimed « Excuse me everyone…do I have your attention? Yes, good. I’m sorry but the party is over. There has been an impediment. Please finish up your drink and head home. » There were people shocked that he would just throw them out like that but Tony being Tony couldn’t care less. He joined the team again and smiled brightly « Avengers we have a Party to attend. Does anyone knows where it is? » The team smiled and T’Challa responded confused « Yes I have the address. » « Awesome let’s go ! », cheered Tony.

At a corner of the room, Nick Fury smiled smugly and texted Maya ‘They’re on their way.’

*gifs not mine, credit to owner*

summary:
Girl Behind The Mask
Pairing: Peter Parker x Reader, Avengers x Reader
Summary: You live a double life; perfect student by day...
body:
Girl Behind The Mask

Pairing: Peter Parker x Reader, Avengers x Reader

Summary: You live a double life; perfect student by day and a masked vigilante by night. One night your vigilante actives goes down hill and it’s has caught the eye of the Avengers and the Government. The government make you sound like a criminal while the Avengers try and find the girl behind the mask, the youngest Avenger takes this as an opportunity to prove himself to Tony. It’s a shame that the girl Peter is crushing on is wanted by the Government.

Series Warnings: Angst, Fluff, Minor Violence, Language

A/N: My brain needs to stop thinking of new series fics for a while cause I have so many unfinished ones. There will be a love story somewhere in this.

A Secret Worth Keeping, Sleep? Sorry don’t know her, Straight A, My Daily Night Routine, Criminal Activity, Government Runaway, Bad Example, See Now You’ve Just Made it Awkward, Your Secret Identity Should Be Your Only Identity, Under The Avengers Eye, I Can Explain, Second Chance, Screw Up, You Are Just A Teenager, Can You Not Make Things Anymore Worse?, I Call It Quits, Under House Arrest, Clear Your Name, All Better Now

Series Playlist

summary: I can't be the only one who thinks Wanda looks (at least) relieved that she's dying in the snap. After all, she just went...
body: I can’t be the only one who thinks Wanda looks (at least) relieved that she’s dying in the snap. After all, she just went through probably the worst experience of her life (killing the last person she knew really loved her) only to have it mean absolutely nothing. She’s just done and could even be accepting her death

summary: The Art of Holding on and Letting Go (Iron Man)
title: The Art of Holding on and Letting Go (Iron Man)
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2vBYnhT

by GoldTitaniumMaiden

The Avengers watch the MCU movies! Takes place after CA: Civil War and starts with Iron Man.

I had this fic up however I was unaware that it got deleted. I’m reposting it hopefully it stays up this time.
